item.title: Carlos Santana - Europa - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Europa by Carlos Santana from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, C7, Dm, F, Gm.

item.title: Instrumental - One Note Samba - Key of C - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song One Note Samba by Instrumental from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B♭add2, C6, C7sus4, C9, F, F7♯5, Gm7, Gm7♭5, G♯7.
